title: Daily 202's James Hohmann top election trends to watch
description: James Hohmann, author of the Washington Post's Daily 202 newsletter, joins Chuck to talk about how news coverage is changing, what to look for in the midterms, and why Minnesota hasn't gone red yet.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
